main.name: Awais
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.about: I'm a dedicated Full Stack Developer with 4 years of extensive experience in building and optimizing web applications. My focus is on creating scalable and high-performance solutions using modern technologies such as React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS. I have a strong passion for problem-solving and am committed to writing clean, maintainable code, contributing to project success through innovative technical solutions. I excel in fast-paced environments and enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy reliable systems that enhance user experiences and achieve business objectives

projects.name: Designs.ai
projects.techstack: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, PostgreSQL, AI, Redux, REST APIs, AWS, RabbitMQ

projects.name: ResumeForge

desc: Gained a strong foundation in computer science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and software engineering.
Completed projects on web development, database management, and mobile app development.
Actively participated in tech seminars and coding competitions, enhancing problem-solving and collaborative skills.
As a Backend Software Engineer at TDC, I played a vital role in contributing to developing and maintaining the company's software infrastructure.

This role was a dynamic and hands-on experience where I had the opportunity to collaborate with a talented team of professionals while learning and applying cutting-edge technologies to solve real-world challenges.
I Worked on several projects for clients as a backend engineer using the Node.js framework.
Worked closely with senior developers to build responsive user interfaces using React and developed backend services using Node.js and Express.
Gained hands-on experience with RESTful APIs, database design, and cloud-based deployment environments.
Contributed to several client projects, collaborating with QA and UI/UX teams to deliver user-focused, scalable solutions.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization solutions, ensuring the protection of sensitive customer data, and reducing security risk.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate third-party APIs and platforms, resulting in a seamless user experience and increased customer satisfaction.
Consulted with engineering team members to determine system loads and develop improvement plans.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and architect scalable game software using NestJS and Express for the backend, and ReactJS for the front-end admin panel.
Designed RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints, enhancing response times and user engagement.
Managed AWS infrastructure and CI/CD automation, reducing costs and accelerating release cycles.
Led the architecture and development of scalable full-stack applications using NestJS, GraphQL, and ReactJS, improving system performance and development speed.
Streamlined CI/CD pipelines with Docker, GitHub Actions, and AWS, accelerating release cycles and optimizing deployment.
Designed and implemented microservices architecture using Docker, RabbitMQ, and Apache Kafka, resulting in a 30% boost in system reliability and modularity.
Conducted code reviews, mentored junior developers, and set best practices for coding standards and system design, leading to a 20% improvement in team delivery efficiency.
Collaborated cross-functionally with product managers, designers, and QA engineers in Agile sprints to meet tight deadlines and deliver features aligned with business goals.
